greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1-4x^2)/(1+3x+4x^2).
comment: Row sums of number triangle A128414.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-3,-4).
formula: For n>0, a(n) = (1/r)^n + (1/s)^n, with r = (-3-i*sqrt(7))/8 and s = (-3+i*sqrt(7))/8 the roots of 4x^2+3x+1. - _Ralf Stephan_, Jul 20 2013
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 - 4 x^2) / (1 + 3 x + 4 x^2), {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 20 2013 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 02 2007
